Happy New Year 2016
We couldn't have done it without you
 
Wow, what a year! At Miracle we saw phenomenal results with our teams while growing and expanding our presence. We nearly doubled our employee count while extending ourselves into two new locations, one in Atlanta and the other in Arkansas.
 
We have very high goals to achieve as we march towards our Vision 2020, and we believe that our Customers, Partners and Employees are the most important drivers of that vision. Our teams are driven by a passion to provide something special, and we hope to continue that 21-year tradition into 2016 as well.
 
While our core focus grows more and more on SAP and Oracle ERP applications, we are also seeing that Social, Mobile and Cloud driven by APIs and Open Source Technologies is becoming the norm at Miracle. Amazon, IBM SoftLayer, OpenStack and others are being rapidly enabled within our teams everyday. With advent of 2-Speed IT our core services of Business Integration, EDI/B2Bi, BPM, Data Integration and Edge Integration seem to be becoming hotter than ever.
 
Everyday our teams strive to work around the latest innovative technologies like Docker, GitHub, Jenkins, Selenium and more as the entire world seems to be taken into the DevOps cycle. We are proud to say that our DBA/ETL/Commerce/Infrastructure services wing is a rapidly growing segment for us to move forward.
 
We hope you too had a great year, and wish you and your families a wonderful and successful new year. Thank you for your continued support, we couldn't have achieved any of this without you.
 
Prasad Lokam
CEO and President
Miracle Software Systems, Inc
